articles.title: Kim Jong Il Meets CPC Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Meets CPC Delegation
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Friday met the visiting delegation of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China led by its Head Wang Jiarui.
					 Present there were Kang Sok Ju, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Xiaoming.
					
					Wang Jiarui conveyed to Kim Jong Il congratulations and a personal message sent by Hu Jintao, General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and President of the People's Republic of China, on the occasion of the lunar New Year and presented a gift prepared by the delegation to him.
					
					 Kim Jong Il expressed thanks for this and asked Wang Jiarui to convey his congratulations on the lunar New Year to the senior officials of the party and the state of China including Hu Jintao. 
					
					 He warmly welcomed the delegation of the CPC that came to the DPRK early this year, the significant "year of DPRK-China friendship," and had a cordial and friendly talk with Wang Jiarui. 
					
					 Then, he hosted a luncheon in honor of the guests.
					
					 The luncheon took place in an amicable atmosphere.

articles.title: Immediate Halt to Moves for War of Aggression against DPRK Demanded
articles.content:
Immediate Halt to Moves for War of Aggression against DPRK Demanded
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Peace Committee of Korea in a statement issued Friday urged the United States and the Lee Myung Bak bellicose forces to clearly know who their rival is and act with discretion and stop at once such moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK as threatening peace and security of the Korean Peninsula and the destiny of the nation.
					 Citing facts to prove that the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers are hell-bent on increasing the military threat to the DPRK and stepping up their moves to ignite a war for aggression against it from the outset of the new year, the statement said that the outbreak of a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula is a matter of time.
					
					 The present developments clearly prove that the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and ambition to stifle it militarily remain unchanged and that the "strategy for waiting" touted by Lee Myung Bak is the one to prepare a war for aggression against the north, ie to kill fellow countrymen, it noted, and went on:
					
					 We value dialogue and cooperation but can never remain an onlooker to the situation today when our sovereignty and dignity are gravely threatened.
					
					 Dialogue and cooperation are aimed at achieving the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the reconciliation and unity of the nation and its peaceful reunification from A to Z and any dialogue and cooperation are meaningless without them.
					
					 It is the disposition and steadfast will of the DPRK to react to the use of force with force and counter the club brandishing with arms.
					
					 All the servicepersons and people of the DPRK keep themselves in an all-out confrontation posture, tightly holding arms of Songun in their hands in view of the prevailing situation. They will decisively shatter the moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppets to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK and ignite a war against it with its resolute and merciless retaliatory measures.

articles.title: Minsok Street in Sariwon
articles.content:
Minsok Street in Sariwon
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Minsok (folklore) Street of peculiar style thick with national flavor is located at the foot of picturesque Mt. Kyongam in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province.
					 There are a historical material display ground, a folk amusement centre and a history museum along the street stretching gracefully on both sides of the street gate roofed with Korean tiles.
					
					 Orderly exhibited in the ground are a model of dolmen, a model of the Chomsongdae Observatory which is known to be the oldest remain of astronomical observatory in the world and other models of typical cultural heritages along with visual-aid materials showing the time-honored history spanning 5,000 years, fine cultural tradition, and resourceful talent of the nation, which heighten national pride among Koreans.
					
					 All the rooms of the folk amusement centre fully equipped with facilities for the visitors to play yut-game, paduk and janggi (Korean chess) are floor-heated after the traditional fashion of the nation.
					
					 The Korean costume shop in the folklore street is animate with customers as it serves well-made Korean costumes catering to the tastes of women.
					
					 The conspicuous figure of the street is sharply outlined by the Koryo medicine store which serves various Koryo medicines widely used by the Koreans from olden times as well as medicinal herbs gathered in different areas of North Hwanghae Province.  
					
					 There are found in the street restaurants serving folk dishes such as glutinous rice-cake and pancake. 
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il, though finding his days so full with Songun revolutionary leadership, visited the folklore street in December last year and acquainted himself in detail with how it was constructed and run and gave precious instructions to add luster to the long history, culture and tradition of the nation.

articles.title: Juche Idea, Foundation of Korean People's Mental Power
articles.content:
Juche Idea, Foundation of Korean People's Mental Power
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Today the Korean people have turned out as one in a general offensive for the prosperity of the socialist country with the indomitable mental power as motive power.
					 This great mental power has its foundation in the Juche idea fathered by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu, the origin of the strong mental power of the Korean people, was also created under the banner of the Juche idea and the indefatigable will which has been displayed to the full in the annals of the revolution was provided by the great attraction and vital energies of the Juche idea.
					
					 The Korean people with Juche-oriented faith won historic victories in the two revolutionary wars against the U.S. and Japanese imperialists and built a powerful socialist country independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in defence on the war debris. They have been working miracles one after another in the efforts for the building of a great, prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 Having an immortal revolutionary idea which is the ideological and spiritual basis of unity and gives the philosophy of unity, the Korean people have achieved unbreakable unity and cohesion and given full play to such strong mental power.
					
					 The lofty spiritual world of the Korean people who absolutely trust in their leader and defend him with their very lives gives the precious philosophical principle that a great idea brings about a great unity.
					
					 The most correct outlook on revolution illumined by the Juche idea enabled the Korean people to possess the justness of the revolutionary cause and the inevitability of the victory as their unwavering faith and turned them into an indomitable heroic people who do not know pessimism and vacillation.
					
					 The greatest exploit performed by the President is that he brought up the Korean people as one of strong ideology, faith and spirit with the radiant Juche idea.

articles.title: Oblivion of Pueblo Incident Brings only Death to U.S.
articles.content:
Oblivion of Pueblo Incident Brings only Death to U.S. 
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists' armed spy ship Pueblo is displayed on River Taedong flowing through Pyongyang, which shows the miserable lot of the defeated.
					Though more than 40 years have passed, a growing number of servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, working people and school youth and children are looking round the armed spy ship with surging indignation.
					
					The Pueblo is a spy ship captured by the Navy of the heroic KPA while perpetrating espionage acts on military and state secrets of the DPRK after intruding into the waters 7.6 miles off Ryo Islet in the East Sea of Korea near Wonsan on January 23, Juche 57 (1968).
					
					After the capture of the ship, the U.S. imperialists mounted a military threat against the DPRK, clamoring that it was seized in the "open sea" and it did not commit any espionage acts. But the tough attitude of the DPRK compelled them to apologize to it for the spy ship's espionage and hostile acts and sign a document firmly guaranteeing not to let any warships intrude into the territorial water of the DPRK in the future.
					
					Nevertheless, the U.S. imperialists illegally infiltrated the large-sized spy plane EC-121 in April 1969 and spy helicopter OAH-23G in August 1969 into the territorial air of the DPRK for the purpose of espionage and hostile acts only to be shot down by the Korean People's Army. They thus drank a bitter cup again.
					
					After then, they have continued to commit espionages against the DPRK in a systematic way including the illegal infiltration of a spy helicopter in December 1994.
					
					They have held desperate war exercises against the DPRK by mobilizing huge amounts of armed forces to lead the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war these years after making the second Korean war fait accompli.
					
					If the U.S. imperialists infringe upon the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK, oblivious of the lesson of the Pueblo incident, they will not be able to escape a shameful death in face of the merciless strike of the powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu with inexhaustible political and military strength.

articles.title: KCNA Rebukes Poor Japanese Politician's Ridiculous Remarks
articles.content:
KCNA Rebukes Poor Japanese Politician's Ridiculous Remarks
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Governor of Tokyo Metropolis Ishihara's hysteria has gone beyond the tolerance limit.
					 Recently he made himself busy sending a "letter" to the supreme headquarters of the DPRK requesting it to reinvestigate the "abduction issue" and talked the nonsense that the "best way" for settling the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula is to "annex" the DPRK to China.
					
					 What a rude and reckless behavior it is!
					
					 Ishihara is a universally recognized political imbecile and crazy ultra-nationalist. 
					
					 His outbursts are devoid of any propriety and logical coherence.
					
					 Once he uttered that China might be divided in the years to come and that would be an ideal time for Japan and its other neighbors in Asia to raise their heads only to lash the countries in the region into fury and provoke derision among them.
					
					 The DPRK does not feel any need to comment on these ridiculous remarks as they were made by the psychopathic politician too long ago to draw the attention of people. 
					
					 But it is necessary to let the world know the reason why he went again into such anti-DPRK hysteria as vociferating about the "abduction issue" and the nuclear issue.
					
					 As for Ishihara, he abandoned the life of the third class writer, carried away by his ambition to become chief executive in Japan. But up to this date when he is near 80 his political career has been so miserable as to remain an insane politician keen to make queer remarks just to improve his image. 
					
					 According to Japanese media, he is employing every possible means and method to establish the sphere of political domination of his family in the Japanese political camp by taking advantage of his present office.
					
					 He was reported to contemplate even shifting Tokyo food market, an issue related to the health of people, to a place polluted with poisonous substances where once stood a gas plant in a bid to curry favor with financial businesses including real estate dealers. 
					
					 Ishihara is no more than a dirty political philistine who does not hesitate to harm the health of people to satisfy his political greed. The above-said ruckus of sending the "letter" and the like kicked up by him is nothing but a ridiculous farce to improve his badly tarnished image. His behavior intended to fish in troubled waters by foolishly challenging the supreme dignity of the DPRK will never be tolerated.
					
					 Ishihara's reckless behavior glaringly revealed the hypocrisy of the ruckuses being kicked up by the Japanese reactionaries over the "abduction issue" and the nuclear issue.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries seem to calculate that they can win popularity and manage to make their living only when they trumpet about the "abduction issue" and the nuclear issue. Japan is, indeed, an abnormal country as such political philistine and those more dead than alive are allowed to ride roughshod in the political camp. 
					
					 Japan is treated as a political pigmy and stands further isolated from the international community than ever before due to such bad guys as Ishihara who is steeped in the hysteric Samurai spirit, carried away by revanchism and national chauvinism.
					
					 No one knows that Ishihara may go the lengths of calling for annexing Japan to the U.S. in the future.
					
					 In this context, one may say Japan is fortunate enough to keep this guy from assuming its premiership up to this date.

articles.title: Lee Group's Moves for Retrogressive Revision of "Moral Textbook" Flailed
articles.content:
Lee Group's Moves for Retrogressive Revision of "Moral Textbook" Flailed
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group forced textbook writers to write "moral textbook" to be used at middle schools from 2010 according to its "standard of writing". In the "standard" the puppets put forward the treacherous theory on "unification through absorption" while absolutizing "differences between the south and the north" and, at the same time, pressurized the said writers not to deal with the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle and the Juche idea.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Friday terms "differences between the south and the north" and "unification through absorption" touted by the puppets heinous treacherous anti-reunification sophism.
					
					 To absolutize "differences between the south and the north" is a criminal act to antagonize fellow countrymen and perpetuate the division of the nation and to spread the theory on "unification through absorption" which had already been thrown into a dustbin after being bitterly condemned by the fellow countrymen is an undisguised revelation of the puppets' ambition to invade the north, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The puppets pressurized the said writers not to mention even a word the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle in a bid to cover up the indelible crimes committed by them against the country and the nation to serve Japan. This is a ruckus which can be kicked off only by traitor Lee Myung Bak ill-famed for his pro-Japanese career, as he was born in Osaka, Japan.
					
					 The above-said "standard of writing" is peppered with phraseologies calling for blocking national reconciliation and unity and seeking confrontation and war. Confrontation with fellow countrymen can never become a "standard" on all accounts.
					
					 The Lee group's moves to retrogressively revise the textbook are intolerable as they are an unpopular anti-reunification act to benumb the younger generation's consciousness of independence against the U.S. and instill into them the idea of slavish submission to its treacherous rule and consciousness of confrontation with fellow countrymen and thus use them as a shock force for confrontation with fellow countrymen and a war of aggression against the north in the future.
					
					 The fellow countrymen will certainly force the Lee group to pay for the crimes committed by it going against national reconciliation, unity and reunification.

articles.title: Suppression of KBS Unionists under Fire
articles.content:
Suppression of KBS Unionists under Fire
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) released a statement on Jan. 19 denouncing the suppression of members of the KBS trade union.
					 The statement accused the KBS management of taking such an unjust disciplinary measure as dismissing eight persons including reporters affiliated to the "KBS Action Group for Defending Public Broadcasting Services" and former chairman of the trade union on Jan. 15.
					
					 The statement charged that this action taken by the Lee Myung Bak regime betrayed the undisguised intention to put the public broadcasting service under its control and it is part of the campaign to quell the resistance of the workers against the retrogressive revision of the "law on broadcasting" at an "extraordinary session of the National Assembly" slated to take place in February.
					
					 Terming the struggle of the unionists for defending the public broadcasting services just, the statement demanded the KBS management side retract the unjust disciplinary measure taken against them and apologize to the people for the suppression.
					
					 If the above-said demand is not met, the KCTU will simultaneously launch a campaign for judging the Lee regime and protesting against the KBS management, it warned.
					
					 On the same day the KBS Media Persons' Association held a general meeting at which it decided to boycott the news coverage and the production of programs in demand of the retraction of the above-said measure.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Regime's Murder of Innocent People Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Regime's Murder of Innocent People Flayed
Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) --A candlelight rally condemning Lee Myung Bak and honoring the memory of the victims was held in Ryongsan, Seoul, on Jan. 21 with at least 1,000 members of civic and public organizations, citizens and youth and students attending. It was sponsored by the Committee of Emergency Measure against the Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan.
					 Speakers at the rally declared they came to the rally unable to repress the towering resentment at the savage murder of evacuees perpetrated by the Lee Myung Bak "government." 
					
					 They went on: "If this situation is allowed to go on, all the people will be killed. Everybody should be vigilant in this tragic land where fellow countrymen are beaten to death."
					
					 "We cannot remain crying only. To struggle is the only way of honoring the memory of the slain evacuees whose bodies were torn to shreds, their eyes remaining unclosed with grudge. We will carry on our struggle to punish the murderers without fail."
					
					 They recalled that upon hearing the news of the murder of innocent evacuees high school students organized the "Emergency Measure Committee of Youth and Children for the Evacuees in Ryongsan", adding that they would wage a joint struggle to let the people know about the truth about the incident and encourage the evacuees.
					
					 The rally was followed by a demonstration.
